span.a:
Brady ISD will post updates concerning the schools situation with COVID-19.
Click this link for the latest information from Brady ISD for COVID-19 Updates.

br.br:
To find specific information for each campus you should click one of the links below.
Brady High School Brady Middle School Brady Elementary School

br.hr:
Brady ISD has three campuses located in the Heart of Texas in Brady, Texas. Brady High School contains grades 9-12. Brady Middle School contains grades 6-8. Brady Elementary contains Head Start, PreK, Kinder and grades 1-5. The football field as well as our track is located across the street from BISD Administration Office at 1003 West 11th Street.
Click here to access us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/BradyISD.
​

a.title: Brady ISD SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATE: APRIL 17, 2020

div.a: Brady ISD SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATE: APRIL 17, 2020
div.div: During a press conference today, Governor Greg Abbott announced that all Texas schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
